## ShadowService type

Shadow service type - creates shadow factories

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ShadowService<TBaseElement> = (options?: ShadowOptions) => ShadowFactory<TBaseElement>;
```
**References:** [ShadowOptions](../shadowoptions/)<!-- -->, [ShadowFactory](../shadowfactory/)
